forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light snow this morning giving way to partly cloudy conditions this afternoon. High -3C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light snow this morning will give way to some clearing this afternoon. High 26F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -9C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds. Low 16F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High -6C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 22F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Becoming windy after midnight. Low around -10C. Winds E at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies with gusty winds developing overnight. Low near 15F. Winds E at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High -6C. Winds E at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 21F. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low -11C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 12F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High near -5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 23F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low around -10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 13F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High -2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 28F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low -9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 16F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with some snow showers early. A steady snow likely later in the day. High -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with some snow showers early. A steady snow likely later in the day. High 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. Low -6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Low 21F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will mix with and change to rain during the afternoon. High 1C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow during the morning will give way to rain during the afternoon. High 34F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Moderating temperatures will change evening snow showers to rain showers by daybreak. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow showers changing to rain showers as the night progresses. Low around 30F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 3C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 1C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 33F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 38F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 1C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 34F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 32F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.
